mdRecord.dcterms:title: 1993 Season
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster for the 1993 Barter Theatre season. Programs include: Miracle Worker: April 13- May 8 | Lend Me a Tenor, May 12- June 12 | Nunsense, June 2- Aug 1 | Cocktail Hour, June 16- July 10 | Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum, July 14- Aug 15 | Frankie and Johnny in Clair deLune, Aug 4-29 | Kuru, Aug 18- Sept 11 | Other People's Money, Sept 15- Oct 9 | Dracula, Oct 13- Nov 7.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
